pages.text: The $(item)Automatic Crystal Cutter$() is a simple machine to automate your $(thing)Energion Crystal farming$(). Simply power it with $(thing)Hot Air$() and plant a crystal in front of it. When the crystal is fully grown, the $(item)Automatic Crystal Cutter$() will harvest it until it is back at its first stage.$(br2)The result can be extracted from any side except top or bottom.

Since it is likely each $(item)Automatic Crystal Cutter$() will spend more time being inactive than active, it is possible to stack large amounts of them vertically with the minimum $(thing)Hot Air$() requirements with minimal penalty.
